parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.54
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Vehicle Inventory

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Containers

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>  Returns all weapons types and count from the cargo space

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[getWeaponCargo]] object

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]] - object to check

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - format [all_types_array, all_counts_array]. Eg: [["a", "b"], [3, 2]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_content = [[getWeaponCargo]] carName;</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_content = [[getWeaponCargo]] ammoBoxName;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[weaponCargo]], [[addWeaponCargo]], [[addWeaponCargoGlobal]], [[clearWeaponCargo]], [[clearWeaponCargoGlobal]]
</value></part></template>
